SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.view

Class ApplicantView

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.view.ApplicantView
public class ApplicantView extends Object
Handles the user interface and interactions for users with the Applicant role. Provides menu options for viewing projects, applying for projects, managing applications, and handling enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantView

      public ApplicantView()
      Default constructor for ApplicantView. Initializes the view components. Controllers are initialized within the ApplicantMenu method using the AppContext.

  • Method Details

    • ApplicantMenu

      public void ApplicantMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Displays the main menu for the Applicant user and handles user input for navigation.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context containing shared resources and state.

    • applyForProjectMenu

      private void applyForProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for applying to a BTO project. Checks eligibility, displays available projects, and processes the application submission.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • viewApplicationStatusMenu

      private void viewApplicationStatusMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for viewing the status of the applicant's BTO application. Allows the applicant to request withdrawal if the application is in a suitable state.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • generateReceiptMenu

      private void generateReceiptMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for generating and displaying a receipt for a successful application (typically after flat selection, although current implementation checks only for application existence).
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • submitEnquiryMenu

      private void submitEnquiryMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for submitting an enquiry about a specific BTO project.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • viewMyEnquiriesMenu

      private void viewMyEnquiriesMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for viewing, editing, or deleting enquiries submitted by the applicant.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.
